meanings.sent1: The old, torn couch was unappealing to sit on.
meanings.sent2: The unappealing painting did not match the room's decor.
meanings.sent3: The unappealing salad looked like it had been sitting out for days.
meanings.sent4: The unappealing weather made everyone want to stay indoors.
meanings.sent5: The unappealing smell coming from the garbage can was unbearable.

meanings.definition: Not likely to attract interest or admiration
meanings.sent1: The unappealing movie failed to capture the audience's attention.
meanings.sent2: Her unappealing outfit did not impress anyone at the party.
meanings.sent3: The unappealing joke fell flat with the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The unappealing proposal was quickly rejected by the committee.
meanings.sent5: The unappealing book cover deterred readers from picking it up.
